The Early Childhood Development (ECD) Project ran from 1998 to 2005 and achieved 86% 
national coverage with US$19 million support from the World Bank (approximately 30% 
of total budget) and additional funding from the Asian Development Bank. The intervention 
used CHWs based in health centres and schools, as well as home visits. Programme 
components focused primarily on supplementary feeding, micronutrient suppl
